page.title: 08Farming.
page.content: Nearly 8/10 of land around the village of Upton is farming land.Most farms in the Upton area are dairy farms, but there are also arable farms growing cereal crops.There are 16 farms providing many jobs.Upton was one of the last villages to drop the old strip farming method and many of the fields are still bumpy because of this.Most of the farms are situated in the Portway Watery lane area.The local dairy is run by Mr.Warner. Milk deliveries are made daily in the village.Farms,Gastrels Farm,Portway,Arable.Pooles Farm, Portway,Dairy.Moorend Farm,Watery Lane,Dairy.Hardwicke Farm,Watery Lane,Arable.Rees Farm,Watery Lane,Arable.
